alert.note: Alert for Coastal Del Norte; Del Norte Interior; Northern Humboldt Coast; Northern Humboldt Interior; Southern Humboldt Interior; Southwestern Humboldt (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 18 at 4:28PM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...GUSTY SHOWERS WILL IMPACT HUMBOLDT AND DEL NORTE COUNTIES THROUGH 500 PM PST... At 427 PM PST, Doppler radar was tracking gusty showers along the Humboldt and Del Norte coast. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Eureka, Arcata, Crescent City, Shelter Cove, Orick, Jedediah Smith State Park, Grizzly Creek Redwoods State Park, Garberville, Hoopa, Willow Creek, Honeydew, Klamath, Jack McNamera Field, Fortuna, Rio Dell, Trinidad, Bertsch-Oceanview, Weitchpec, Carlotta, and Bridgeville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
